 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁבִיס‎</span> **noun [masculine]** ==front-band== (Mishna id.; [[BDB#Levy|Levy]]<sup>NHWB iv. 498</sup>; al. compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, literally a ***sun***, of small glass ***neck-ornament*** [[BDB#We|We]]<sup>Skizzen iii. 145</sup>; Hebrew perhaps a diminutive, see [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:86»§ 86</sup> note); — plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַשְּׁבִיסִים‎</span> [[Isa.3.18|Isa 3:18]], in list of women's finery.
